method_3_priority_queue.description: Assign higher priority to development agents

method_4_selective_spawning.description: Spawn specific agents by ID for development
method_4_selective_spawning.use_case: Test specific agents without spawning full suite

method_5_resource_pooling.description: Create separate development executor with dedicated resources
method_5_resource_pooling.use_case: Complete separation of development and production

method_6_agent_limiting.description: Limit number of agents spawned per state
method_6_agent_limiting.use_case: Test with subset of agents before full deployment
